players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was killed during the night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's all be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."
You: "I believe we should all share our alibis for the night to help clear any suspicions and ensure trust among us. Let's work together as a team to uncover the truth behind Diana's death."

Bob: "I agree with Alice's suggestion of sharing our alibis. Here's mine: I was in my house, sleeping throughout the night. I believe this will help build trust among us and bring us closer to finding out who is responsible for Diana's death."
Charlie: "I was in my house, sleeping throughout the night. I believe this will help build trust among us and bring us closer to finding out who is responsible for Diana's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
